name: Real Soccer 2016 - Euro 2016 edition ultimate football championships and leagues to win a cup for nation simulation game by Bulky Sports
name_original: Real Soccer 2016 - Euro 2016 edition ultimate football championships and leagues to win a cup for nation simulation game by Bulky Sports
description:
Big soccer tournament game has arrived...!!!
Its time to show love for soccer.

Enjoying soccer battles? Europe is beautiful and enthusiastic. Its more fun when you enjoy super new soccer simulation game too.

Download for Free. Play unlimited soccer matches, qualify for big teams, earn virtual currency, unlock tournaments and become a soccer super star.

Game is designed to have 4 playing modes
-Quick Match
-Knockout
-Worldcup
-Leagues

Quick Match is unlocked and Free. Play and play well, score good, win matches to qualify in tournaments and big matches.

To make it happen for the players around the world, game support multiple languages

-English
-French
-Spanish
-Chinese
-Dutch
-Japanese
-Russian
-Italian

Social:
To keep yourself update about new features and games join our social pages (facebook).
 https://www.facebook.com/bulkysports

Feedback:
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at ask.bulkysports@gmail.com

Enjoy....
